name: Turtle Trouble in Tropical Town
description:
Experience the process of carcinisation!

Hold your human hands as though they are crab claws, place them on either end of the keyboard so you can easily press the z and / keys with your thumbs while also using the q and ] keys with the rest of your soft weak human fingers.

As a newly forged crab your duty is to protect baby turtles from the vicious gulls that circle overhead on hatching day!

Move with z and /
Attack with q and ]

Protect those endangered little cuties!
